page.title: 03TRANSPORT TRAFFIC NORTHOP
page.content: Results show that this junction is very busy, with most traffic using the main A55(T) road.There were many lorries which came from local areas but we were surprised to see some from Dublin, Rochdale and Liverpool. From just carrying out this small project it is obvious that Northop does have a traffic problem and a bye-pass is needed. Northop councillors are calling for a reduced speed limit on a road where a small child was knocked down this week.Residents are worried about the speed of traffic travelling along the main road from Northop to Flint.They say that more accidents could occur as young children cross the busy stretch of road near Northop Cricket Club.Part of the road already has a 30mph limit, which may be extended into the village
